title: Blogging is Fun
body: Blogging allows you to imagine and be creative â€“ Imagination and creativity is a must and with writing you can mix words and thoughts and images. There are so many topics you can cover, you just need to see how that topic can be of help to your readers.

title: New Seasons of Hunter x Hunter!
body: After waiting for almost years since it first arrived on Netflix, another season of Hunter X Hunter is set to arrive on Netflix. Originally it was set to release on July 1st but now, they are showing for release on August 1st, 2021 but only in the United States.  What sort of challenges can set back coding deployments in a similar fashion? What are some issues that likely exist in both sectors? ie. "Crunch Time."

title: Party at South Beach
body: With working mobile on the rise, there are now more "digital nomads" than ever before. We are literally able to go to the beach and continue working on coding, app support, conferencing, or any number of other fully remote possibilities! With that in mind, what are some pros and cons of this kind of setup? How can working mobile change the way we do our work?
